EmailTemplate.description: Customer aq- email to customer referer
EmailTemplate.name: CA - Email to Referer
EmailTemplate.subject: Sharing is Caring.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi (NAME),
Thank you for sharing the sun!
One of BlueWave's trusted partners (MERGE PARTNER NAME) will be in touch with (REFEREE NAME) shortly to assist with the Community Solar sign up process.
We'll be in touch again letting you know if (REFEREE) successfully signs up!
Thanks for sharing!
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Solar 111 Huntington Ave, Suite 650 Boston, MA 02199
Questions or concerns about solar? Call us at 844.768.4100 Email us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com
